scripts.publish: git subtree push --prefix demo origin gh-pages
scripts.release:master: git checkout master && git merge --squash develop && git commit -am 'Release Commit'
scripts.release:bugfix: npm version patch -m 'Bumped patch version number'
scripts.release:feature: npm version minor -m 'Bumped minor version number'
scripts.release:breakingchange: npm version major -m 'Bumped major version number'
scripts.deploy: npm run build && git commit -am 'Deploy Commit' && git push && git subtree push --prefix demo origin gh-pages
